#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>

using namespace std;

int main()
{

    long long n,i,root,sum;

    while(scanf("%lld",&n)!=EOF)
    {

     sum=0;

     root=sqrt(n);

     for(i=1;i<=root;i++)
     {

       if(n%i==0)
       {

        sum=sum+i;

        if(n/i!=n && n/i!=i)
        sum=sum+n/i;

       }

     }

     cout<<sum<<endl;

   }

   return 0;

}
